ygData.subject: Re: Monk Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night I actually got a Black pearl off of a spectre in the Oasis. they seemed to be  dropping alot of jewelry last night. Kizmet Bayashi Monk of the 38th
ygData.messageBody:
Last night I actually got a Black pearl off of a spectre in the Oasis. they
seemed to be dropping alot of jewelry last night.

Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 38th level
Da'Kor Guild
E-Marr
----- Original Message -----
From: Dave Woomer <dwoomer@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999 5:22 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Monk Questions


> From: "Dave Woomer" <dwoomer@...>
>
> Black pearls are a rare drop off of level 30ish mobs, or so I've been
told.
> I got mine off of an Avocet near the Aviak village and got a very nice +7
> dex/agi gold choker made with it. I was level 23 in a group of 5,
including
> a level 27 druid and 28 wizard. Those suckers hit HARD, so I don't think
I'd
> be able to solo one until 30, 31, maybe, if then. A friend also got a
black
> pearl off of a Centaur Corser (sp?). And like someone else mentioned
> already, griffs seem to drop them too. They're rare, so just have to keep
> working at it.
>
> Good luck!
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, September 20, 1999 3:31 PM
> Subject: [EQ-Monks] Monk Questions
>
>
> >From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
> >
> >Black pearls come from Aviak Avocets right? I have killed all the
> >avocets I really want to kill and have never gotten a black pearl.
> >
> >How rare of these suckers?
> >
> >Also, Quillmane seems to have some decent Monk equipment, do you
> >take a faction hit for killing him? The equipment is no_drop.
> >
> >
>
> >
